programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: TACA Airlines Flight #110 Boeing 737-300 series May 24th, 1988 Flying through a violent thunderstorm, TACA Flight #110 begins its final descent towards New Orleans when both engines quit and the plane begins dropping from the sky. The pilots restart both engines but almost immediately they overheat forcing the pilots to shut them down. Without power for the second time and falling fast, they consider ditching the plane in a canal but aim instead for a narrow grass levee. With 38 passengers bracing for a crash, the pilots manage one of the most remarkable landings in the history of commercial aviation. Then its up to investigators to determine why the engines of a brand new Boeing 737 failed in mid-flight.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Episode one begins on an unremarkable Dutch canal. What we see unfold, however, is anything but. Its one of the most dramatic construction catastrophes in recent history: a double telescopic crane collapse, a barge capsizing and a 187-ton bridge span all careening into a quiet residential neighbourhood resulting in the total destruction of dozens of homes. The reason? A combination of wind, lack of balance and crane operator error. From there, we travel to Asia, where some of the worlds biggest construction sites fail before construction even begins. We witness a variety of construction site collapses: massive holes in the ground that implode in dramatic fashion, hurling retaining walls, roads and equipment dozens of metres below into a pit. Substandard soil conditions and reclaimed land seem to be the biggest reasons for these fails.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Apollo 13 really explode 200,000 miles from Earth? What caused the devastating fire that swept through the MGM Grand in Las Vegas? Why could the world famous Ponte Morandi bridge in Italy simply collapse and kill 43 people?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling journey through Germanys greatest feats of engineering. From the awe-inspiring technology thats allowing engineers to build rail lines 40m below Munich city centre, to the secrets of a record breaking swing bridge across the river Ems. Marvel at twin ship lifts that carry cargo vessels 40m in the air and step back in time to visit restoration work at the worlds tallest church.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: The UKs engineering wonders revealed: including innovative electric flying machines, ingenious skyscrapers, the secrets of Londons Tower Bridge, a 57 billion pound railway and a mega-stadium with a surprising historical twist.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: The simplest mistakes are at the heart of some of the worst airline accidents, and while commercial pilots undergo hundreds of hours of training and testing, even experienced pilots can make deadly rookie errors. A botched takeoff in Buenos Aires kills 60 people and the cause stuns investigators. Just two months after 9/11, American Airlines Flight 587 crashes in Queens, New York, igniting fears that America is once again under attack. And, when Continental Airlines 3407 stalls above Buffalo, the flight crews baffling reaction proves fatal.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: November 12th, 1996 - Shortly after take off from New Delhi, Saudi Airways Flight 763 levels off at 14,000 feet. As the crew waits for clearance to climb to their cruising altitude, the plane is hit by a Kazakhstan Airlines jet. The collision cripples both planes. They spiral violently to the ground, killing all 349 people on board. Its the worst mid-air collision in the history of aviation. The two wreckage fields are five miles apart. As investigators comb through the charred debris for evidence, they try and answer troubling questions: Why did the two planes collide? Whos responsible? And can they stop it before it happens again?

programme.title: The Next Mega Tsunami
programme.desc: Ten years after one of the most deadly tsunamis ever known, scientists are making a shocking discovery. Experts used to believe that the biggest killer waves were only generated in a handful of regions.

programme.title: Witness: Disaster in Japan
programme.desc: On March 11, 2011, a 9.0 magnitude earthquake struck 75 miles off the eastern coast of Japan. Almost immediately, tsunami warnings blared, urging residents along Japans coast to quickly move to higher ground. For the next several hours, residents watched in stunned horror as a series of massive waves slammed into the coast, inundating entire towns and sweeping across the countryside, laying waste to everything in its path. Throughout, amateur videographers, news crews, government agencies, tourists, and countless others were recording the sights and sounds of the unfolding catastrophe. Weaving together their footage, Witness: Japans Disaster reconstructs the earthquake and tsunami as they happened, entirely through the eyes of those who experienced them.

programme.title: Joplin Tornado
programme.desc: With archival sources and dramatic interviews, experience the deadliest tornado since 1950 through the eyes of those who lived through it.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 19 July 1989, United Airlines Flight 232 was making its regularly scheduled flight from Denver to Chicago when the DC-10 aircraft suffered a catastrophic failure to the tail-engine. The crew onboard faced the impossible task of landing with a total loss of control. 112 passengers perished in the horrific crash but thanks to the incredible crew, 184 people survived the fifth-deadliest crash involving a DC-10. In this episode we hear from multiple survivors as well as the first-officer, Bill Records, who gives a rare first-hand account from the cockpit, of what could have been the crews final moments..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Episode two begins with the horrific fire at Notre Dame Cathedral in the spring of 2019. Multiple eye- witnesses captured the raging flames on their phone cameras, but what they couldnt capture was the frantic, behind-the-scenes confusion and infrastructure fail that contributed to making the fire much more devastating than it should have been. We take viewers behind the scenes. Next, we take a take a look at scaffolding, an integral piece of construction equipment. When it fails, the results can be catastrophic. But why does it fail? We examine the reasons through multiple examples.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: The Australian Border Force investigates potential criminal activity on the tarmac. Emergency Planning Manager Riki oversees a multi-agency operation to repatriate 241 passengers arriving from Lebanon. Vision-impaired passenger Ninas assistance dog Nixon makes his final flight before he retires, Melbourne Cup runner up Warp Speed heads back to Japan.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Dangerous weapons concealed in luggage test airport security. Paramedics rush to treat a passenger suspected of having a stroke. A large group of VIPs require special attention, and a secret world beneath the terminals is revealed for the first time. Elsewhere, the hunt is on for the perfect aviation photograph.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Explorer Albert Lin searches the Peruvian Andes for the lost Chachapoya kingdom, a forgotten civilization in the clouds, that ruled for nearly 1000 years before the conquering Inca. Alberts expedition will take him from raging rapids to the dense cloud-forests of the Andes, using his extraordinary tech to reveal the lost world of the Cloud Warriors.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: First century AD and the Romans dominate much of the known world. But their plans to conquer Scotland are foiled by a band of barbarian insurgents called the Picts. Explorer, Albert Lin scales sea cliffs, explores caverns, swims rapids and uses high-tech scanners to discover a lost kingdom that may answer how the mysterious Picts were behind one of the greatest military upsets of their time.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: When an aircraft loses total engine power, a pilots training can make all the difference in the world, but its still up to investigators to determine what went wrong. An Airbus flames out en route to Hong Kong, and the crew is determined to avoid a disastrous ocean ditching. En route to Australia, a mysterious engine failure ultimately leads to a giant leap in aviation safety. And, after a terrifying ten-kilometer freefall, a captain is hailed as a hero by passengers, but the resulting investigation tells a different story.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Three mysterious accidents send investigators hunting for clues. In the end, all three trails lead back to the same source-the fuel tank. Minutes before touching down in Portland, United Airlines 173 loses all four engines over a densely populated suburb. In Japan, a Boeing 737 lands safely, but then catches fire with all 165 passengers and crew still on board. And, nearly 700 miles off course, the crew of Varig Flight 254 are forced to make a crash landing in the Amazon jungle.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. We follow our main charachters, the heroic rescue workers, in both the southern and norhern mountains of norway. With extreme tought winter conditions that often results in in dangerous rescues, our men always come to the rescue. This is man vs nature and no rescue is too small for our rescue workers.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Highway Havoc!
programme.desc: Journey through the unforgiving and inhospitable climate of Norways frozen mountains with the elite rescue crews who come to the aid of stranded travellers and battle round-the-clock to maintain access to vital road links. With sudden changes in the weather, from torrential rain to snow blizzards and sudden temperature changes, the teams have their work cut out for them. Risking life and limb in some of Europes harshest conditions, it takes a special breed of men and women to overcome the many challenges thay face on a daily basis. As the roads turn into icy bobsleigh tracks, haulage container vehicles and private cars and vans all get themselves into difficulties and need to be rescued by our road warrior heroes.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Ruins excavated on Pitcairn Island shed light on a previously unknown civilization. In the jungle of Borneo, researchers discover a strange green light in the pitch-dark forest. The remains of a long-lost temple are found decaying on the Greek island of Euboea. Coral rubble unearthed on Sudans Suakin Island unveils the vibrant past of a marine trade center in the Red Sea.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Coastal erosion exposes skeletal remains, revealing the haunting past of Medieval floating prisons. A special type of spider is discovered on an isolated island. Archaeologists uncover evidence that could point to the fate of the lost Roanoke settlers. Thousands of dead seals are found with strange corkscrew wounds in Canada, confounding experts.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The shroud of Turin is one of the most debated archaeological artifacts in the world. Is it the burial cloth of the Christian messiah, Jesus of Nazareth, or is it an elaborate fake? Every time the evidence points one way or another, a credible counter argument is raised. In the collective imagination of the mid-20th century, jetpacks were the personalized transportation of the future. American engineer Wendell Moore really did develop and test a model for the military, so why dont we all have one? Buried for 2,400 years, a pair of beautiful cups are discovered in a grave mound made by Scythians, an ancient civilization of the Caucasus Mountains. What can the cups be for if they have holes in the bottom? And why are they solid gold?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1898, a stunning object shows up at the British Museum. Carved and polished from a single piece of quartz, it is shaped like an immaculate human skull. Is this a creation of Mesoamericans, as originally claimed? Why is it rumoured to possess supernatural power? A gruesome-looking chair from ancient China, housed at the Wellcome Collection in London, is covered in sword blades, spikes and ornate decorations. Clearly, this is no love seat. Is it some kind of torture device, or more than meets the eye? From a long-buried library in the lost Assyrian city of Nineveh comes a peculiar round tablet scribbled with cuneiform writing. Is it the work of astronomers, proof of an ancient apocalypse, or a 3,000-year-old instruction manual?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1995, a bone of an extinct bear is found in a Slovenian cave that could rewrite our place in the story of evolution. The bone appears to be carved with intention by someone at least 10,000 years before humans arrived in that part of the world. Who made it and why? A simple black dress shoe sits in a glass case in the Heinz Nixdorf Museums Forum in Germany. The reason? More than just a shoe, this is a high-tech machine for its time, designed to do the impossible: beat the casino. And an intricate purple gemstone adorned with silver snakes, quartz scarabs and cryptic words, has a long history intertwined with illness, ruin, tragedy and death. Where did it originate, and could it really be cursed?

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. The clothes in a 19-year-olds bag are oddly damp - theyre soaked in liquid cocaine. Police uncover a 16 kg load in a suitcase. Officers detain two Colombians headed to Mexico. Theyve travelled from the Amazon - and they may be carrying. In the mail facility, cocaine is found infused in a blanket and hidden in artisanal boxes.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: U.S. Virgin Islands Air and Marine agents chase a boat through international waters into the British Virgin Islands, ultimately seizing over 1,800 kilos of cocaine. The Mayaguez unit responds to a call about a capsized migrant vessel and finds suspicious bundles floating at sea. Agent Andujar and his team in Fajardo come across suspected smugglers operating a modified vessel.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: A quiet day turns tense as drug traffickers lead the Coastguards boats and helicopters on a high-speed chase as they try to reach Moroccan waters, where the Spanish teams have no jurisdiction. An illegal fishing boat has entered a protected nature reserve and must be stopped. And a distress call comes in for a dinghy drifting in dangerous waters with 14 people onboard.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: During the night, a call from a distressed mother alerts the Coastguard to a potential suicide attempt in a treacherous area. Aided by helicopters, a team intercepts drug traffickers carrying over 3 tons of hashish. Fishermen using illegal devices try to fish in protected waters and a German sailboat raises suspicion.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Megastructures
programme.desc: Exciting documentary series that shows viewers some extreme and extraordinary construction projects- the biggest, tallest, longest or deepest in the world, and the machines that are used to create such amazing structures. The series features interviews with designers and project managers, who present the problems of construction and the methodology or techniques used to overcome obstacles. Some megastructures included in the series are US Navys aircraft carrier, the USS Ronald Reagan, highway with no speed limit built in Germany, undersea tunnel built between France and United Kingdom, worlds longest suspension bridge in Japan, twin tower skyscraper in Kuala Lumpur, etc.

programme.title: Megastructures
programme.desc: Floating on the shores of the Arabian Gulf, is the Louvre Abu Dhabi. Designed by star architect Jean Nouvel, this Arabic-inspired museum is built is association with the Louvre Paris to house over 400 priceless masterpieces. Shading the gallery buildings is a massive steel dome, weighting 7,000-tons - a feat of engineering never achieved before. The Louvre Abu Dhabi is a visionary piece of architecture, ahead of its time, and quite possibly a work of art in its own right.

programme.title: Megastructures
programme.desc: Exciting documentary series that shows viewers some extreme and extraordinary construction projects- the biggest, tallest, longest or deepest in the world, and the machines that are used to create such amazing structures. The series features interviews with designers and project managers, who present the problems of construction and the methodology or techniques used to overcome obstacles. Some megastructures included in the series are US Navys aircraft carrier, the USS Ronald Reagan, highway with no speed limit built in Germany, undersea tunnel built between France and United Kingdom, worlds longest suspension bridge in Japan, twin tower skyscraper in Kuala Lumpur, etc.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: It takes mountains of meat, onions, and hamburger buns to keep up with the hot demand for White Castles iconic sliders; this awesome machine processes and prepares 1.7 million mandarin oranges every hour; and these heart-shaped crackers are showered with love - and sesame seeds.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Get the inside scoop on the iconic, cult-favorite PEZ candies and their trusty dispenser sidekicks; discover the secret to making the cheez-y-est bags of crispy mini waffles; and theres plenty of "amore" in this frozen chicken Parmesan with spaghetti meal from Texas.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did the shuttle Columbia tear itself to pieces during reentry? Why did so many die in the worst high speed train crash in history at Eschede in Germany? How did a concrete high rise in London called Grenfell Tower become an inferno that killed 72?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did a Titan II nuclear missile explode in its Arkansas silo? What flaw made the sinking of the ferry Estonia the worst European maritime disaster since Titanic? Why did the oil rig Piper Alpha explode; the most lethal offshore accident in history?

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Maritime archaeologists and historians go in search of the crucial component in the Atlantic Slave Trade: the slave ship. An armoured, floating fortress operating for over four centuries, capturing and transporting over 12 million Africans, who were sold and forced to work in brutal conditions in the New World. By draining we reveal the cruel technology on-board, gain an insight into the horrific conditions and ID a wreck in Alabama that could be the last ever slave ship to bring Africans to American soil.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: In the summer of 1940 adolf hitlers nazis have conquered france, just 20 miles of sea seperates his army and his next target, great britain. The mighty luftwaffe is sent to bomb britain into submission, destroy the royal airforce and prepare for seaborne invasion. Now we can uncover the wrecks of planes and ships that reveal the truth how britain stood firm against the nazi raiders and defeated hitler in the battle of britain.

programme.title: Lost Cities with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Lost Cities combines hi-tech archaeology, breath-taking visuals and genuine exploration to make headline-grabbing discoveries. Lost Cities brings adventure, science and archaeology together through our host Albert Lin. Our ambitious approach applies 3D scanning to some of the most extraordinary sites of antiquity. This series will deliver powerful, emotional stories with hi-tech imagery to bring the mysteries of the past vividly to life.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Archaeologists investigate one of the greatest female pharaohs in history - Hatshepsut. A team digging around her iconic temple find clues about her powerful reign. A rare discovery inside one of Hatshepsuts ancient quarries sparks an investigation which leads to the magnificent temple of Karnak.. And one archaeologist discovers dramatic evidence about the lives of women in ancient Egypt whilst excavating mummy parts from inside an ancient tomb.

programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1995, a bone of an extinct bear is found in a Slovenian cave that could rewrite our place in the story of evolution. The bone appears to be carved with intention by someone at least 10,000 years before humans arrived in that part of the world. Who made it and why? A simple black dress shoe sits in a glass case in the Heinz Nixdorf Museums Forum in Germany. The reason? More than just a shoe, this is a high-tech machine for its time, designed to do the impossible: beat the casino. And an intricate purple gemstone adorned with silver snakes, quartz scarabs and cryptic words, has a long history intertwined with illness, ruin, tragedy and death. Where did it originate, and could it really be cursed?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1898, a stunning object shows up at the British Museum. Carved and polished from a single piece of quartz, it is shaped like an immaculate human skull. Is this a creation of Mesoamericans, as originally claimed? Why is it rumoured to possess supernatural power? A gruesome-looking chair from ancient China, housed at the Wellcome Collection in London, is covered in sword blades, spikes and ornate decorations. Clearly, this is no love seat. Is it some kind of torture device, or more than meets the eye? From a long-buried library in the lost Assyrian city of Nineveh comes a peculiar round tablet scribbled with cuneiform writing. Is it the work of astronomers, proof of an ancient apocalypse, or a 3,000-year-old instruction manual?

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: In the summer of 1940 adolf hitlers nazis have conquered france, just 20 miles of sea seperates his army and his next target, great britain. The mighty luftwaffe is sent to bomb britain into submission, destroy the royal airforce and prepare for seaborne invasion. Now we can uncover the wrecks of planes and ships that reveal the truth how britain stood firm against the nazi raiders and defeated hitler in the battle of britain.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans

Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A Bali-bound flight faces delays after a service truck crashes into its undercarriage. Australian Border Force find illegal weapons in a passengers luggage. Unregistered taxi drivers are caught in the act and theres a fuel leak on the tarmac. At night, a mysterious Soviet-era plane lands unannounced.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Duty Manager Dan must deal with a check-in outage at the start of the busy school holidays. Airside Safety responds to a life-or-death medical emergency on an incoming flight. 68 racehorses valued at $300 million dollars arrive from Europe. Overnight, the airside lighting team carry out vital work while dodging planes.

programme.title: Iberias Woodlands: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: Rivalry defines all life in the forests of the Iberian Peninsula. The arrival of summer marks the beginning of what will be a prolonged period of drought in the region, making survival even more difficult for the animals who live there.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Big Cat Week
programme.desc: Around the world, big cats are among the most recognized and admired animals. However, with each passing year, they are faced with greater challenges and higher risk of extinction in the wild. In this programme, we take a close-up look at these extraordinary animals in their natural habitats spanning from the Okavango Delta and the Serengeti to Thailand and more. Follow along for all the dramatic stories and find out what it takes to create a healthier environment for the natures fiercest felines to help them outrun the threats to their extinction.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.

programme.title: Incredible Animal Journeys
programme.desc: Alaskas River Rice. In the wilds of Alaska, theres one journey that rules them all the great salmon run. Leap with a female salmon battling a torrent of obstacles to spawn, soar with a juvenile bald eagle and trek with a first time brown bear mom.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols are preparing for sheep to give birth, which means figuring out how to catch and shear their four Merino ewes - no small task as this is new territory for everyone except Dr. Pol. Then, while helping his dad on a farm call, Charles has a terrifying accident. The whole family rallies together to care for Charles and take care of the farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its been a year of farming for the Pol family. Even with Charles recovering from his injury, the farms showing no signs of slowing down! Beth takes the next step with her bees to grow the colony and harvest honey. Charles and Ben come up with a final fix for the sheep huts drainage problem. The whole family comes together to plant the garden and celebrate a successful year on the farm.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Skittering, swimming and even gliding, over 12,000 species of reptiles roam the world. Crocs, turtles, snakes and lizards have ancestors as old as the dinosaurs and evolution as their friend. These cold-blooded creatures have adapted in clever and lethal ways, from armoured skin and poisonous venom to record-breaking bite force and even blood squirting eyes. This is Reptile Planet!

programme.title: Europes New Wild
programme.desc: This stunning six-part nature series tells the inspiring story of the rebirthing of the wild regions of the continent of Europe. A land formerly full of diverse wildlife and contrasting landscapes, Europe was in need of special rewilding teams to embark on a mission to return species to their natural habitat and this series focuses on six regions that have benefitted from the project. The Carpathian Mountains of Romania have seen the reintroduction of European bison while rural depopulation in Spain and Portugal offers up the opportunity to expand the wild nature of the Iberian Peninsula. The teams also look at how bears and humans can live peacefully, side by side and explores the myriad creatures that call the Danube Delta home. The unique culture and atmosphere of Lapland plays host to distinctive wildlife and the Sámi people and a natural balance is being restored to the Balkans.

programme.title: Mara: Rebirth
programme.desc: Part 1 of our series starts with the dust of the disappearing migration as it heads off across the river and leaves. Behind them, hundreds if not thousands of other animals cannot move, or wont move, because they are locked into territories, invisible barriers that say to them, leave your bubble at your peril. This is their story. It is the story about what happens between September and the following July. Nine months of wildebeest-free Mara.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Skittering, swimming and even gliding, over 12,000 species of reptiles roam the world. Crocs, turtles, snakes and lizards have ancestors as old as the dinosaurs and evolution as their friend. These cold-blooded creatures have adapted in clever and lethal ways, from armoured skin and poisonous venom to record-breaking bite force and even blood squirting eyes. This is Reptile Planet!

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol

programme.title: Hippo vs Croc
programme.desc: Two of Africas deadliest animals live side by side, one a hefty herbivore, the other the most successful freshwater predator on the planet.

programme.title: Python Invasion
programme.desc: Scientists and hunters team up to fight one of the biggest ecological threats to the Florida Everglades: the Burmese python. In the 1990s, pet pythons were released into the wild and have eaten their way through the food chain. Today, nobody knows how many there are, but estimates may be in the hundreds of thousands. We follow the scientists as they track, gather data, and try to understand better how Pythons reproduce and adapt in the Everglades. Ian Bartoszerk and his team at the Conservancy of Southwest Florida use male scout snakes to lead them to females with the potential to lay up to eighty eggs at a time. At the U.S.G.S., Amy Yackle and Mark Sandfoss work in tandem with wildlife biologists from the National Park Service and the University of Florida to battle female reproduction on another front — Alligator Alley.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Skittering, swimming and even gliding, over 12,000 species of reptiles roam the world. Crocs, turtles, snakes and lizards have ancestors as old as the dinosaurs and evolution as their friend. These cold-blooded creatures have adapted in clever and lethal ways, from armoured skin and poisonous venom to record-breaking bite force and even blood squirting eyes. This is Reptile Planet!

programme.title: Crocodile - Australias Greatest Survivor
programme.desc: In Australia, dominant saltwater crocodiles, called ""boss crocs," are the largest and most powerful animals on the continent. Even after unrelenting human pressure on their very survival, they are still the masters of their world. Over the last 200 years, the impact of human activities—such as commercial hunting, agriculture and population growth—pushed them to the brink of extinction. Today, these "boss crocs" have continued to not only survive but thrive.

programme.title: Croc Wars: Grumeti Vs Mara
programme.desc: Each year, nearly two million wildebeest and zebra cross the Serengeti on a quest for fresh grazing. But two legendary rivers stand in their way—the Grumeti and the Mara—each ruled by a formidable dynasty of Nile crocodiles. In "Croc Wars," follow these ancient predators as they prepare for the feast of the year, but not all crocodiles are created equal. In the deep, fast waters of the Mara, privilege reigns, kills come easy, and food is plentiful. In the rugged Grumeti, crocodiles must outwit, adapt and fight for every scrap. From brutal ambushes to stolen kills, this is a high-stakes battle for survival on two rivers with two strategies and only one chance to eat.

programme.title: Mara: Rebirth
programme.desc: Part 2 sets the scene, now the zebras wander off, a striped echo of part one. If the first episode is dusted in browns and yellows, this is green as the landscape changes and the rain turn again, rising rivers, making it difficult for everyone again, flooding, rushing waters in a raging torrent. Paradise it may be, but it is a harsh paradise. As the rains clear, we catch up with another character introduced in the first episode, our serval mother that had her den flooded; but she reveals that she has survived. And so has her cub - a miracle under these circumstances.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Lake Tanganyika: Africas Blue Heart
programme.desc: Lake Tanganyika, one of the largest lakes on earth, combines two different yet equally magical worlds: an untouched wilderness along the shores, home to chimpanzees, elephants and antelopes and a spectacularly diverse underwater universe.

programme.title: Mara: Rebirth
programme.desc: Part 2 sets the scene, now the zebras wander off, a striped echo of part one. programme.desc: In Australia, dominant saltwater crocodiles, called ""boss crocs," are the largest and most powerful animals on the continent. Even after unrelenting human pressure on their very survival, they are still the masters of their world. Over the last 200 years, the impact of human activities—such as commercial hunting, agriculture and population growth—pushed them to the brink of extinction. Today, these "boss crocs" have continued to not only survive but thrive.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Mountain Queens. The Ethiopian Mountain world is ruled by two very different queens, but both mothers with daughters. A gelada monkey rules a tight knit sisterhood and an Ethiopian wolf mother must be ruthless to protect her own legacy.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Wet and Wild Rainforests. In the heat of the rainforest, Phil reveals the survival adaptations of the elusive tree kangaroo, colorful cassowary and lethal scrub python.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: In the endless heat of the sands near Munga Thirri, (The Simpson Desert), Phil encounters Australias largest lizard - the perentie, our fastest flightless bird - the emu, and the worlds largest marsupial - the red kangaroo.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: In the heart of Tanzania, the towering walls of the Ngorongoro crater sets a stage for one of the most infamous rivalries in the natural world. The sisters of a formidable lion pride clash with a hyena clan ruled by an all-powerful queen. The sisterhood share responsibility, while the hyena queen must play clan politics and enforce a strict hierarchy to keep her crown.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Tiny Jungle Queens. Under the rainforest canopy of Central America is a secret world ruled by insects. Two tiny queens will give everything to build their empires.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Coastal Queens. In the Gulf of California, the orca familys success relies on the experience of their 63-year-old matriarch while on the beaches of Alaska, a first-time bear mother must raise her three cubs alone, with only her instincts to guide her.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The African Savanna is home to the ultimate animal sisterhood; a family of elephants. A new baby will need the familys support to make it through her early vulnerable months. While mom learns how to care for her, it is the babys grandmother, the matriarch, that must protect her. Facing predators, drought and a rapidly changing world can this new baby and her family of iconic females survive?

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: In the heart of Tanzania, the towering walls of the Ngorongoro crater sets a stage for one of the most infamous rivalries in the natural world. The sisters of a formidable lion pride clash with a hyena clan ruled by an all-powerful queen. The sisterhood share responsibility, while the hyena queen must play clan politics and enforce a strict hierarchy to keep her crown.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: A Moo York State of Mind. The Schroeders road trip to New York to visit Dr. Erins parents, surprising her dad with a 1910 Cadillac. While there, Dr. Erin helps her old mentors, even working with an animal shes never handled before: an elk!

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Despite challenging weather conditions, Drs. Ben and Erin Schroeder treat a wild bald eagle that needs immediate care before returning to the wild. The Schroeders also make a farm call to vaccinate a pair of emus and attempt to wrangle a pig with dangerously overgrown tusks.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Grūbera kungs izdara labu Padingtonam un saka, ka viņš var pateikties, izdarot labu kādam citam. Tas ir grūtāk nekā izklausās! Padingtons uzzina par kompostēšanu, pateicoties Mulča kungam. Vai viņš paspēs izaudzēt puķes tantei Lūsijai?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons mācās par bitēm un nolemj palīdzēt tām ražot medu, iestādot puķes, bet kāds domā, ka tās ir nezāles! Vindzoras dārzos ir karstuma vilnis, Mateo izpārdevis visus saldējumus, tāpēc viņš kopā ar Padingtonu rada jaunu garšu!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad ceļojošā veterinārārste daktere Diva nevar laikā veikt visu Celtnieklīcī dzīvojošo dzīvnieku apskati, Rabla komanda zina, kā jārīkojas. Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc sniegota pārsteiguma pienākšanas, Rabla komanda piedāvā palīdzēt Hedlija viesnīcā. Kad kāpnes izrādās nepietiekami ātras, ir laiks celt. Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kad Barbatēta dzīve parādās Barbamamma un barbabērni, viņa māja paliek par mazu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs,

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū viņai palīdzēs.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komandai jāizdekorē Sjerras Spīdošās skatuve, koncerts izvēršas neticams Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Laipnais lāčuks Padingtons pārvācas uz Londonu pēc tam, kad zemestrīce iznīcina viņa mājokli. Te viņš apmetas uz dzīvi pie Braunu ģimenes – Henrija, Mērijas, Džūdijas un Džonatana. Kaimiņos viņiem dzīvo īgnais Karija kungs, kuram enerģiskais lācēns diez ko nepatīk. Padingtons katru dienu raksta vēstules savai tantei Lūsijai, kurās stāsta par dienas piedzīvojumiem un pārsteigumiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons palīdz izperēt olu, bet ir jāgaida ļoti ilgi. Kad tā beidzot izšķiļas, viņš tiek pie pārsteiguma! Padingtons vēlas, kaut varētu piedalīties Braunu kāzās, apskatot fotogrāfijas, un viņi nolemj to visu atkārtot!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Reindžere Roza lūdz Rabla komandu salabot Lāču salas tiltu. Kad remontdarbos iejaucas Ātrmeistars, ķepaiņiem jāsatīra viņa radītā nekārtība un jāpasargā lāčus no ātri tuvojošās vētras... ar tantes Celtnes jaunās Būvētavas Bultas palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Autokinoteātrī tiek izrādīta jauna Supervāveres filma. Kad Ātrmeistars sarīko kārtējo jezgu, ķepaiņiem jārīkojas, lai glābtu situāciju. Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Riveram uzņemt daudz fotogrāfiju foto konkursam, uzbūvējot ļoti ātru veidu, kā pārvietoties pa Celtnieklīci. Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni grib izgudrot, kā Da Vinči.

"Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vientuļniekvēzīti Šelliju, kura pazaudējusi savu čaulu un paslēpjas Zābaciņa zābakā. Dora dodas meklēt Šellijas mitekli. Tētis rīko kesadilju pikniku, bet ir aizmirsis mājās visas sastāvdaļas! Dora apņemas tās aizgādāt.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda uzbūvē māju vecā kokā - īstu štābiņu vairākos stāvos! Izbēg fermeres Zojas jaunās vistiņas, Rabla komandai darba pilnas rokas.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!
